posts.title: Fire Pit Jack-O-Lantern Pumpkins
posts.content: Give your Halloween party some hellish ambient lighting by throwing these fire pit Jack-O-Lantern pumpkins into the flames. Each pumpkin can withstand temperatures of 3000°F and features a hollowed out center so the flames show through the eyes, nose, and mouth.

posts.title: LEGO Taj Mahal Set
posts.content: LEGOs aren’t just for kids – this LEGO Taj Mahal set contains just under six thousand pieces and is not for inexperienced LEGO builders. This highly detailed and time consuming LEGO kit makes a great gift for the master LEGO builder looking for a real challenge.

posts.title: Mini Wooden Ballista
posts.content: Assert yourself as the rightful king of the cubicle with these mini wooden ballistas. Each ballista comes ready to assemble from a laser cut wooden kit, and includes mini wood ammo pieces that are capable of being shot up to thirty feet!

posts.title: Pet Water Fountain
posts.content: Your cat only drinks running water because he has discerning tastes. Water that has been sitting around gets stale and gross – why would a refined kitty stoop so low? Make sure that your cat is taken care of with this drinking fountain — it will please his kitty sensibilities.

posts.title: Compact Portable Generator
posts.content: Power up all your essentials while you’re living off the grid by using this compact portable 120,000 mAh generator. It can by charged by solar power or with an A/C plug and offers triple output modes – a 12V car socket, A/C outlet, and 4 USB ports.

posts.title: Smart Automatic Pot Stirrer
posts.content: Save time and effort by preparing your delicious meals with help from this smart automatic pot stirrer. This portable kitchen aid is designed for pots measuring 6 to 12 inches in diameter, and will prevent your food from sticking, burning, and pot scorching.

posts.title: Solar Crank Emergency Station
posts.content: Stay connected and informed in the event of mass power outages using this solar crank emergency station. It can be charged either using the hand crank, a micro USB, AAA batteries, or the trust ol’ sun. It also comes with a handy built-in flashlight ideal for nighttime use.

posts.title: Big Talk Question Card Game
posts.content: If you want to skip the small talk and really get to know someone, then you should play the Big Talk Question Card Game. The game contains 89 small cards printed with questions to help you connect with anyone on a deeper and more meaningful level.

posts.title: Shark Slippers
posts.content: Lounge in total comfort while you’re at home by letting these hungry sharks chomp on your feet. These ultra comfy shark slippers are made from cashmere and fitted with non-slip particles on the thick bottom to ensure you don’t slip while walking around.

posts.title: Light Up Slippers
posts.content: Walk around in the middle of the night without fear of stepping on random objects on the floor with these light up slippers. These slippers don’t need to be turned on manually, just slip your feet into them and the weight sensor automatically turns the slipper lights on.

posts.title: Portable Mosquito Repeller Device
posts.content: Keep yourself from becoming the main course at the blood buffet without having to get all sticky from sprays by using this mosquito repellent device instead. It’s virtually odor-free, runs silently and creates a fifteen foot zone of protection against bugs.

posts.title: Light Up Word Clock
posts.content: Help kids – and some adults – tell time with greater ease with the light up word clock. While traditional analog clocks can confuse the dimwitted, the written number face of this light up clock gives you the time in an easy to read and classy display.
